name: Avoid Main Procedures having complex queries (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) having complex queries.
output:
The report lists all PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) having complex queries. 

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) full name
rationale: Having complex queries in SQL Artifacts can cause performance problems.
remediation: Review the SQL queries in order to reduce the complexity of the queries.
